member.name: M:ApiPJ.Controllers.V1.GenericUserController.Register(ApiPJ.Models.GenericUser.GenericUserRegisterInputModel)
member.summary: Allows you to create a new system user who is not registered
member.returns: May return Ok(code 200), BadRequest(code 400) or internal error(code 500)

member.name: M:ApiPJ.Controllers.V1.GenericUserController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: You can delete a user based on the CPF(unique) informed.
member.returns: May return Ok(code 200), notFound(code 404) or internal error(code 500)
